record.key: Benabi_Script_01^MessageBox, "As the Chimer gathered around the campfire, young Ben'Abi looked beyond the sickly mountains of the Ashlands into the heart of Red Mountain. Too many of his brothers and sisters had the broken land of Vvardenfell already claimed. Just this morning two scouts of his tribe had been caught unprepared in a monstrous ash storm and suffocated right before his eyes. The day before, one of the tribe's healers succumbed to weakness and eventually died.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_01^MessageBox, "Gdy Chimerowie zebrali siê wokó³ ogniska, m³ody Ben'Abi spojrza³ ponad górami Popielnych Ziem w kierunku serca Czerwonej Góry. Zbyt wielu jego braci i sióstr zabra³a nieszczêsna wyspa Vvardenfell. Zaledwie dzisiejszego poranka dwóch zwiadowców z jego plemienia zosta³o zaskoczonych przez potworn¹ popieln¹ burzê i udusi³o siê na jego oczach. Dzieñ wczeœniej jeden z plemiennych uzdrowicieli wyraŸnie os³ab³ i w koñcu zmar³.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_02^MessageBox, "He couldn't bear it anymore. He had to do whatever he could to mend this land. With little more than a small bag of supplies and a pouch filled with seedlings of various flora, most of them procured from the more fertile mainland of Resdayn, he took off.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_02^MessageBox, "Ben'Abi nie móg³ tego d³u¿ej znieœæ. Postanowi³ zrobiæ wszystko, co w jego mocy, by uzdrowiæ tê ziemiê. Z niewielk¹ torb¹ z zapasami i woreczkiem wype³nionym sadzonkami ró¿nych roœlin, z których wiêkszoœæ pochodzi³a z ¿yŸniejszej kontynentalnej czêœci Resdayn, wyruszy³ w drogê.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_03^MessageBox, "On the first day Ben'Abi took to the infernal rifts of Molag Amur. He tried planting the seedlings in the fertile volcanic ash, carefully placing them as to not get destroyed by the hot gas tunnels or fiery lakes of the region. ", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_03^MessageBox, "Pierwszego dnia Ben'Abi wyruszy³ w piekielne szczeliny Molag Amur. Próbowa³ zasadziæ sadzonki w ¿yznym wulkanicznym popiele, ostro¿nie umieszczaj¹c je tak, by nie zosta³y zniszczone przez wyziewy gor¹cych gazów i ogniste jeziora bêd¹ce g³ównym elementem krajobrazu tego regionu.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_04^MessageBox, "He waited patiently, but no matter how long he waited and tended to the seedlings, growing weaker and more ill by the day, poisoned by the harsh conditions of the land, even those that haven't been burned completely just wouldn't grow. Frustrated, Ben'Abi continued his journey to the north.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_04^MessageBox, "Czeka³ cierpliwie, ale bez wzglêdu na to, jak d³ugo to trwa³o, sadzonki z dnia na dzieñ stawa³y siê coraz s³absze, zatrute przez surowe warunki tego miejsca. Nawet te, które nie zosta³y ca³kowicie spalone, po prostu nie ros³y. Sfrustrowany Ben'Abi kontynuowa³ swoj¹ podró¿ na pó³noc.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_05^MessageBox, "After several days on foot, his supplies almost used up and feeling more weary with each step, Ben'Abi reached the northern shores of Vvardenfell. Once again Ben'Abi tried to plant the seedlings all across the infertile land, tending to them carefully. Days passed and Ben'Abi grew increasingly weak, but his spirit was still strong and he carried on.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_05^MessageBox, "Po kilku dniach pieszej wêdrówki, gdy jego zapasy by³y ju¿ na wyczerpaniu i z ka¿dym krokiem czu³ coraz wiêksze zmêczenie, Ben'Abi dotar³ do pó³nocnych brzegów Vvardenfell. Po raz kolejny spróbowa³ zasadziæ sadzonki na nieurodzajnej ziemi, pielêgnuj¹c je starannie. Dni mija³y, a Ben'Abi stawa³ siê coraz s³abszy, ale jego duch by³ wci¹¿ silny, wiêc kontynuowa³ sw¹ pracê.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_06^MessageBox, "Much to his surprise the seedlings eventually grew into small mushrooms and they continued to grow until they reached the size of small trees. Ben'Abi couldn't believe it, but mixed with his joy was a feeling of dread. He was dying and knew that he would not be able to return to his tribe.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_06^MessageBox, "Ku jego zaskoczeniu, z sadzonek wyros³y ma³e grzyby, które nie przestawa³y rosn¹æ, a¿ osi¹gnê³y wielkoœæ ma³ych drzew. Ben'Abi nie móg³ w to uwierzyæ, ale jego sercu obok radoœci pojawi³ siê strach. Umiera³ i wiedzia³, ¿e nie zdo³a wróciæ do swojego plemienia.", "Ok"

record.key: Benabi_Script_07^MessageBox, "Before his lifeless body the Lady of Dawn and Dusk appeared. She stood in front of him, placed a black rose on top of his dormant heart and wept. A lone tear touched the ground and beneath Ben'Abi's body roots and flora began to grow, eventually enveloping the entire surroundings.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_07^MessageBox, "Zaledwie kilka dni póŸniej Ben'Abi znalaz³ siê na skraju œmierci. record.key: Benabi_Script_08^MessageBox, "They grew into a small, lively patch of flora, then a copse and eventually an entire grove. Over time the winds carried the seeds to the shores of Vvardenfell, to the regions nowadays known as Sheogorad, the Azura's Coast and the Zafirbel Bay, turning the rocky wastes into fertile, habitable land.", "Ok"
record.val: Benabi_Script_08^MessageBox, "Najpierw pojawi³a siê niewielka plama zieleni, która rozros³a siê w niewielki zagajnik, by w koñcu zmieniæ siê w gaj.
